Class RestaurantController

java.lang.Object
uni.insubria.theknife.controller.RestaurantController
public class RestaurantController extends Object
The RestaurantController class manages the user interactions and UI updates related to restaurant information, reviews, and replies. It handles functionalities such as displaying restaurant details, managing user reviews, and user session behaviors.
